name: Run and Smash Zoombies
description:
Your character has landed in the zombies world. It's a zombies warzone. You will have to save the city, you either can smash or pass the zombies. But the more you smash the better your killing score gets. You will face great zombie warriors, they have their bosses, and bigger devil zombies, with few other zombies.
You can choose from different game characters and game weapons. Get the power ups and shields. Buy coins or either make them by smashing the zombies.
Last but not the least this is one of the best running games you will find. Unlike other adventure games of this niche, you can also control the speed of your character, with great other features. So enjoy the essence of hyper casual games, and Simulation video games at the same time.
